review: I bought this mainly for the purpose of using it in a hotel for my little kids to watch some Prime and Netflix kids shows.  It was easy to set-up and get started and the remote, while not voice activated, worked well.  There is also a Fire TV Remote app for your smartphone although I haven't tried it yet.  The HDMI stick runs on a mini-USB power adapter (included) so if your TV has a USB slot you can plug it into that for power.  If not it does come with a power adapter plug for a wall socket.  The power cord is only about two feet in length so you'll need some kind of extension chord or surge protector to plug into for far away outlets.
